document_data.name: Xarrnous' Second Sword Arm
document_data.mainbody: '''''Xarrnous' Second Sword Arm''''', commonly known as the '''''gauntlets of weapon skill''''', was a set of [[Item enchantment|magical]] [[gauntlet]]s that increased the combat prowess of the wearer.
document_data.Powers: When worn, these gauntlets allowed an individual to strike at their foes with greater accuracy.
document_data.History: These gauntlets were named after their most well-known owner, the smuggler and mercenary, [[Xarrnous]]. He often lent them out to any clients that traveled with him as he felt having an extra sword arm often proved handy.
document_data.Notable Owners:
*[[Elan Garaq]], a [[rakshasa]] trader in the [[Black Pits]] in the [[Underdark]].
*[[Larze]], an [[orge]] assassin from [[Baldur's Gate]] ''circa'' [[1368 DR]].
